info.title: Paperless Manufacturing
info.description: This API is used to interact with SyteLine

tags.name: Authentication Methods
tags.description: Methods related to authenticating with the SyteLEAN Web Service

tags.name: DataView Methods
tags.description: Methods that return data from various forms.

post.summary: Authenticates the User to access the portal and grant access to the SyteLEAN Web Service "On-behalf Of"
post.description: Allows the user to authenticate with SyteLine to retrieve an access code.

get.description: Retreives data fields from the Job Orders form in SyteLine about a given item

parameters.name: jobNumber
parameters.description: Job Number to retreive data for

get.description: Retreives data fields from the Item Master form in SyteLine about a given item

post.summary: Creates a Job Order in SyteLine
post.description: Creates a Job Order in SyteLine with the defined properties.

get.summary: Retreives a list of warehouses available to the User
get.description: Retreives a list of warehouses available to the User

get.summary: Validates that a specific Location exists for a Warehouse
get.description: Validates that a specific Location exists for a Warehouse.

get.summary: Lists Item Inventory Details for the given Warehouse, Location & Item combination
get.description: Lists Item Inventory Details for the given Warehouse, Location & Item combination

get.summary: Lists Item Inventory Details for the given Warehouse & Location combination
get.description: Lists Item Inventory Details for the given Warehouse & Location combination

get.summary: Lists the Items available to manufacture for a work bench/cell
get.description: Retreives the list of Items available to manufacture in the Work Bench for a given planner code. (Work Bench method)

parameters.name: plannerCode
parameters.description: The SyteLine planner code. Used to reference work bench.

post.summary: Completes a Job Operation in SyteLine
post.description: Completes a Job Operation in SyteLine

get.summary: Gets the note field for a Job Operation
get.description: Retreives the first note text available for a Job Operation. If no existing note, return back "No note available".

200.description: Successfully retreived the Job Operation Note

post.summary: Appends a note to the Job Operation
post.description: Appends specificed note text to the first existing note within the specific Job Operation, if existing. If a note does not exist, create a new note marked as Internal.

200.description: Successfully retreived the Job Operation Note

get.summary: Returns a list of Operations for the given Job Order
get.description: Retreives and returns the Operation Details for a given Job Order

200.description: Job Order exists and Operations List was successfully generated

get.summary: Determines if all of the materials for a serial number have been issued.
get.description: Determines if all of the materials for a serial number have been issued.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: Serial Number referenced on Job Order

200.description: Retrieved Job Materials List Response Successfully

get.summary: Determines if all of the materials for a job order have been issued.
get.description: Determines if all of the materials for a job order have been issued.

200.description: Retrieved Job Materials List Response Successfully

post.summary: Issues material to the given Job Order/Serial Number
post.description: Issues material to the given Job Order/Serial Number

post.summary: Issues material to the given Job Order/Serial Number
post.description: Issues material to the given Job Order/Serial Number

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: Serial Number referenced on Job Order

get.summary: Retrieves the flattened BOM for the given Job Order number
get.description: Retrieves the flattended (consolidated) BOM for the given Job Order number.

200.description: Retrieved Job Materials List Response Successfully

get.summary: Returns the Job Orders status from SyteLine
get.description: Returns the Job Order status from SyteLine, such as Released, Stopped, Complete, etc.

200.description: Status of the Job Order in SyteLine

get.summary: Requests the PDF version of the Job Operations Listing Report
get.description:
Requests the PDF version of the Job Operations Listing Report:

* The SyteLEAN Web Service Send Report fields to the end point

* End point will submit background task to run report 

* End point will immediately return a URL to watch for report output

* Once report is available browsing to the URL will serve the PDF

200.description: Job Operations Listing Report Request Successful

get.summary: Requests the PDF version of the Weir Lot/Serial Traceability Report
get.description:
Requests the PDF version of the Weir Lot/Serial Traceability Report:

* The SyteLEAN Web Service Send Report fields to the end point

* End point will submit background task to run report 

* End point will immediately return a URL to watch for report output

* Once report is available browsing to the URL will serve the PDF

200.description: Weir Lot/Serial Traceability Report Request Successful

serialNumbers.description: Serial Numbers associated with the job

workBench.description: Workbench the Available Items belong to

jobNumber.description: The Job Number to be used when creating the Job Order. Using "?" should auto-fill the remaining digits.

operation.description: Job Operation the note belongs to
Job Operation the note belongs to

success.description: Successfully completed the operation or not
Successfully completed the operation or not

jobNumber.description: The Job Number to be used when creating the Job Order

status.description: The corresponding SyteLine Job Order Status. Return the status of "Unreleased" for jobs that do not exist

jobNumber.description: The Job Number to be used when creating the Job Order
The Job Number to be used when creating the Job Order

issuedFully.description: If the job/serial number is fully issued or not

JobMaterialsListResponse.description: Flattened BOM for the Job Item

quantityPer.description: Quantity of Material Item per Unit

quantityRequired.description: Quantity of Material Item required to satisify each Job Item

quantityIssued.description: Quantity of Material Item that has been issued to the Job / Serial Number

materialType.description: Material Type from Items -- Other, Material, Fixture, etc.

operation.description: Job Operation number that the material is allocated to.

jobOrder.description: Job Order to issue materials to.

issueMaterials.description: Materials to issue to the job/serial number

jobOrder.description: Job Order to issue materials to.

serialNumber.description: Serial Number to issue materials to.

issueMaterials.description: Materials to issue to the job/serial number

serialNumber.description: If applicable, the items Serial Number

quantity.description: Quantity to issue. If serial number the qty must be 1.

expirationDate.description: If lot, supply the expiration date if required.

valid.description: If the Warehouse & Location combination exists or not

locationOnHand.description: On Hand quantity for the Item in the specific Location

ItemInventoryDetails.description: Details for an item within a Location

lotTracked.description: Is the Item Lot Tracked in SyteLine?

serialTracked.description: Is the Item Serial Tracked in SyteLine?

quantity.description: Quantity of Lot for the Item

userNotification.description: If the Web Browser should inform the User of the error or not
